Coromandel: Power line and tree topple on to car in west coast settlement https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/coromandel-power-line-and-tree-topple-on-to-car-in-west-coast-settlement/72GRFV4ATVEPDPGCIYKOLG7OA4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/coromandel-power-line-and-tree-topple-on-to-car-in-west-coast-settlement/72GRFV4ATVEPDPGCIYKOLG7OA4/ The incident was on a private property next to Te Puru School. Wed, 29 May 2024 02:06:34 +0000 A tree and power line have toppled on to a car near the settlement of Te Puru about 10 kilometres north of Thames on the west coast of the Coromandel.
Blood service strike: hospital surgeries postponed; surgeons to warn ‘no guarantee of blood transfusion’ - but union says blood will be supplied https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/blood-service-strike-hospital-surgeries-postponed-surgeons-to-warn-no-guarantee-of-blood-transfusion-but-union-says-blood-即将供货/LXB5YJFBENEK5K34ZCZJECNWBU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/blood-service-strike-hospital-surgeries-postponed-surgeons-to-warn-no-guarantee-of-blood-transfusion-but-union-says-blood-即将供货/LXB5YJFBENEK5K34ZCZJECNWBU/ Nicholas JonesPatients told: "I cannot guarantee you will be able to receive a blood transfusion". Wed, 29 May 2024 02:01:05 +0000 NZ Blood Service workers will strike for four hours on Friday, and for 24 hours on June 4. This will cause hundreds of elective surgeries to be postponed. Photo / 123rf.com
